title.rendered: Top 22 PHP Web App Development Companies

content.rendered:
Have you ever wondered which companies are the most reliable for PHP web app development? Or, where should you look to find top-quality PHP web app development firms, and how should you choose the best between them? 

Today, we will discuss all these questions and explore the top 22 PHP web app development companies of 2024.

We analyzed many factors when compiling this list, including customer reviews, portfolio quality, and industry experience.

These companies are experts in web app development and can help you create a perfect website for your business.

76.7% of the websites are built using PHP server-side programming language.

Moreover, PHP, ASP.NET, and Ruby are the top three app development programming languages used for web app development.

Let’s move further and analyze a few vital factors to list the top 22 PHP web development companies in 2024.

Criteria For Selecting the Best PHP Development Companies

It is crucial to select the company based on a few factors; this will help you analyze its work and success. We’ve included the factors below to explore whether the organization is eligible to be listed in the top PHP web development companies list.

  • Total years of experience: This factor will help you recognize the company’s total experience in the market. With the help of this, you can examine whether the company is recognized in the current market or not.
  • Work portfolio: You can see the developer’s work by viewing the portfolio. This will help you examine the development team’s and company’s work, which means which technology the developers use to work on the projects.
  • Client name & testimonial: To recognize the company’s identification and reputation, one should always focus on this factor. This parameter will help you in examining the company’s status.
  • Globally launched projects: Not only is working on multiple projects sufficient, but examining the number of projects the organization delivers is essential.
  • Awards & Recognition: You can examine the company’s positions by analyzing this factor.
  • Hourly pricing: By examining this factor, you can choose a company as per your budget.
Transform Your Digital Presence with PHP!

Utilize invertio' innovative PHP web app development to enhance functionality and user experience.

Connect Now

Top-rated PHP Web Development Companies

We have mentioned a list of the best PHP website development companies here. These companies provide leading PHP web development services globally. The developers of the organizations provide solutions to startups, SMEs, and top brands.

The experts of the listed PHP development companies have vast knowledge of PHP frameworks like Laravel, Symfony, Yii, CakePHP, etc.

Also read: Top 16 PHP Frameworks to watch out

1) PixelCrayons

PixelCrayons is a leading offshore web development company providing innovative and cutting-edge web solutions to clients worldwide. With over 19 years of experience in the industry, the firm has mastered the art of delivering world-class PHP web development services.

Moreover, the company has a team of highly skilled and experienced developers who are experts in creating custom PHP applications.

Services Offered: Web Development, Mobile App Development, E-Commerce Development, Digital Marketing, etc.

Why Hire PHP Developers from PixelCrayons?

  • 19+ years of experience
  • Employee strength: 450+
  • 13,800+ Successful Projects
  • 97% Customer retention rate

Clients: TESCO, Blacks, Kickers, kraft foods, JOHN DEERE

Also Read: PHP Is Incredibly Better Than Its Other Alternatives For Web Projects

2) invertio

 

invertio is a popular IT outsourcing company that provides innovative solutions for valuable PHP web development services. Established in 2004, we have dedicated PHP developers who know how to deal with various industries’ projects.

Companies Specialities: Mobile & Web Development, Software Development, IT Outsourcing, Outsourced Software Development, Dedicated Software Teams, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, Machine Learning, IoT, Offshore Software Development, and more.

Why Hire PHP Programmers from invertio?

  • 19+ total years of Domain Experience
  • Hourly Pricing: $25 / hr
  • Globally launched 4200+ projects
  • 25,000+ Satisfied Clients
  • 97% client retention
  • ISO & NASSCOM certified company

Also read:  Latest PHP Web Development Trends That Will Dominate In 2024

3) ScienceSoft

ScienceSoft is a Texas-based web development company with 35 years in the business. Its PHP skills contributed to Viber, one of the top 10 messaging apps worldwide with 1B+ users. In reviews, clients highlight that ScienceSoft manages to deliver quality results on schedule and within budget, even when new requirements or conflicting stakeholder opinions come up.

Services Offered: Web and Mobile Development; Custom Software, SaaS, and Product Engineering; IoT, Blockchain, AI & Big Data, AR/VR; Cloud & DevOps (AWS and Azure Partner), Legacy App Modernization

Why Hire PHP Developers from ScienceSoft?

  • 160+ large-scale PHP projects, 4,000 total projects.
  • Featured in Newsweek & Statista’s Most Reliable Companies 2025 and IAOP’s Global Outsourcing 100 (2022–2024).
  • Certified in ISO 9001, ISO 27001, and ISO 13485 for service quality and security.
  • Industry expertise in BFSI, healthcare, ecommerce, manufacturing, and real estate.
  • Experience in achieving software compliance: HIPAA, GDPR, PCI DSS, NIST, SOC 2, etc.
  • Hourly rates: $50–$99/hr.

Prominent clients: IBM, Ford, eBay, Robert Half, PerkinElmer.

4) WPWeb Infotech

WPWeb Infotech stands out as a leading PHP web development company, renowned for delivering custom and innovative PHP solutions. Since their inception, they have cultivated a team of skilled PHP developers, proficient in tackling diverse projects across various industries. Their commitment to excellence and a deep understanding of PHP technology empowers them to craft bespoke web solutions that drive success and efficiency for businesses.

Companies Specialities: Web Development, WordPress development, CMS Development, IT Outsourcing Service, IT Staff Augmentation, eCommerce Development

Why Hire PHP Developers from WPWeb Infotech?

  • 9+ years of experience
  • Employee strength: 50+
  • 15k+ Successful Projects
  • 94% Customer retention rate
  • Clients: Automattic, GoDaddy, Foxi Music, Cannabis Content

5) OpenSource Technologies

It is a well-known IT company founded in 2009. The company’s offices are located in India and the US. They offer top-notch solutions to their clients. This company’s expertise utilizes advanced technologies like PHP, Laravel, and more to develop mobile apps and websites.

Company Specialities: CMS Development, Web Portal Development, Mobile Apps Development, Digital Marketing, Hybrid App Development, and PHP web development services.

Why Hire PHP Programmers From OpenSource Technologies?

  • 11+ years of experience
  • Launched 1500+ projects
  • 98% project success ratio
  • 200+ Employee strength

6) Hidden Brains

It is one of the reliable and certified IT outsourcing companies that provides top-level PHP web development solutions. The company was founded in 2004, including experienced developers who work efficiently on the project.

Companies Specialities: Mobile/Web App Development, Graphics & Multimedia Solutions, Quality Assurance Services, IT Consultancy, Enterprise IT Solutions, IoT, Wearable App Development, Cloud & DevOps, AR/VR, Big Data Analytics, and more.

Why Hire PHP Developers from Hidden Brains?

  • 18+ years of experience
  • Hourly Rate: $25 – $49/hr
  • Employees Strength: 201-500
  • 2400+ happy clients
  • Clients: McAfee, INCENTRA, Maxtor
  • Holds Deloitte Technology Fast 50 Awards

7) NMG Technologies

It is a well-known PHP website development company located in Delhi, India. The organization’s talented development team can ideally handle small to big projects. The organization’s developers always try to deliver innovative solutions to their clients.

Companies Specialties: Advance Website Development, Custom Software Development, Mobile App Development, Ecommerce Solutions, Content Management Solutions (CMS), Cloud Apps, Software Development, Web Design, and Mobile Design

Why Hire PHP Developers from NMG Technologies?

  • 14+ years of total domain experience
  • Hourly Rate: $25 – $49 / hr
  • 50+ employees strength
  • Clients: RGP, Intuit, Bacardi, Nikon, IPG Media
  • Certified Partners: Microsoft GOLD Partner, Google Partner

8) Octal IT Solution

It is an ISO 9001:2015 certified PHP development company founded in 2005. In the organization, dedicated developers have handled multiple projects in various industries like healthcare, retail, eCommerce, and more.

Companies Specialties: Web Design and Development, Mobile Application Development, Custom Software Development, Microsoft Solutions, Enterprise Solutions, SaaS Development, and more

Why Hire PHP Developers from Octal IT Solution?

  • 14+ years of experience
  • Hourly Pricing: $25 – $49 / hr
  • 180+ employees strength
  • 1300+ Successful Projects
  • ISO 9001:2015 certified company
  • Clients: Vodafone, BMW, Redcard, Sportsjunki, Mottiz, Prshots

9) Kanda Software

Kanda Software has been designing and developing websites for over 15 years. They have a team of best PHP developers focused on custom web development projects. If you want to create an e-commerce site or CMS website or integrate payment gateways into your website, then Kanda’s experts can help!

Services provided by Kanda Software: Custom Software Development, Mobile App Development Services, iOS/Windows/Android App Development, Quality Assurance (QA) Services, DevOps, Java Development, AI/Machine Learning, .NET Development, Python Development, Ruby on Rails Development, and more.

Why hire PHP coders from Kanda Software?

  • 25+ years of experience
  • Hourly Rate: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Employees Strength: 250–999
  • Clients: OneSky Group, Rue Gilt Groupe, Imprivata
Boost Your Online Performance by 30%!

Our skilled PHP developers at invertio can optimize your web applications for faster load times and better SEO.

Book Consultation

10) A3logics

A well-established, award-winning PHP development company that offers its services to clients overseas. The organization specializes in creating mobile-friendly websites using open-source technologies such as WordPress, Joomla!, Codeigniter, and CakePHP.

Services provided by A3logics: IT Business Solutions, E-Commerce Solutions, Enterprise Mobility, Application Development, AWS Development & Administration EDI Services, iPhone Development, Staffing, Salesforce Consulting, and more.

Why hire PHP web developers from A3logics?

17+ years of experience
Hourly rate: $25 - $49 / hr
Employee strength: 250–999
1285+ Successful Projects
587+ clients worldwide
91% Client ratio

11) Exaud

Exaud is a leading PHP web development company serving clients for 2012. The PHP developers of the organization are very well-versed and know how to create SEO-compatible websites. Moreover, they also offer Android and iOS app development services.

Services provided by Exaud: Custom Software Development, Mobile App Development Services, E-Commerce Solutions, Web Application Development & Maintenance, WordPress Website Designing/Development Services, etc.

Why Hire PHP Coders from Exaud?

  • 14 + years of in-market experience
  • Hourly Rate: $25 — $49 / hr
  • Employee strength: 10–49
  • Clients: Audi, Ford, Nissan, and Peugeot-Citroën

12) VAO

VAO is a well-known PHP development company delivering high-quality services for over 16 years. This organization’s dedicated PHP development team is very skillful and can help you with any kind of website design or application development project.

Services provided by VAO: Enterprise Mobility, Custom Software Development, Mobile App Development Services, Windows/iOS App Solutions and Maintenance, Web Application Design & Implementation Services.

Why Hire PHP Coders from VAO?

  • 16+ years of experience
  • Hourly rate: $25 — $49 / hr
  • Employee strength: 11–50
  • Clients: Honeywell, Symantec, Juice Plus

13) Kultprosvet

Kultprosvet is a reliable PHP development company that has been delivering excellent services in the web industry for over 12 years. The developers at Kultprosvet are skilled in designing and developing innovative websites using PHP, E-Commerce Solutions, and Custom Software Development Services.

Services provided by Kultprosvet: Web Application Development & Maintenance, Custom Software Development, Web Design, Laravel, UI/UX, Node.js, React, React Native, Team Augmentation, eCommerce Solutions, and more.

Why hire PHP developers from Kultprosvet?

  • 12+ years of experience
  • Hourly rate: $25 — $49 / hr
  • Employees strength: 47
  • Clients: GamersPoint, Oko, WaysGo, and more

14) Radixweb

Radixweb is a well-known PHP development company serving various industry verticals such as healthcare, retail, eCommerce, travel & tourism, and more.

Their dedicated PHP development team consists of experienced and seasoned developers who can help you with all business needs, such as custom app creation, eCommerce solutions, marketing automation services, and more!

Services provided by Radixweb: Web Application Development, Embedded Software Development, Cloud Computing, Application Modernization, Software Maintenance, Mobile App Development, AWS Development, AWS, AngularJS, UI, UX, and so on.

Why hire PHP web developers from Radixweb?

  • 21+ total years of experience
  • Hourly rate: $25 — $49 / hr
  • Employees strength: 500
  • 4200+ projects delivered
  • 93% Clients Retention
  • Key Clients: FastTrack, eCAT, RRCollection, Compliance Group

15) Vardot

Vardot is a leading PHP web app development company that has been offering IT solutions for over 12 years. The PHP developers of this firm are very well-versed and can create web applications for eCommerce, product catalogs, or blogs.

Services provided by Vardot: Custom Web Application Development, Digital Marketing Services, eCommerce Solutions & Integration with Payment Gateway APIs, Consulting Services.

Why Hire PHP developers from Vardot?

  • 11+ years of experience
  • Hourly rate: $100 — $149 / hr
  • Min. project cost: $25,000+
  • 200+ Successfully Launched Platforms
  • Clients: Vodafone, Modern American School, King’s Academy

15) Unleashed Technologies

Unleashed Technologies is a leading custom PHP web development company that offers website design and app development services at affordable rates. The experienced team of dedicated PHP developers can help you integrate complex technologies with your projects to fulfill your business needs.

Services provided by Unleashed Technologies: Web Design, Web Development, Application Development, Linux Hosting, Microsoft Hosting, eCommerce web app development, Drupal, PHP development services, Magento, WordPress, Symfony, Progressive Web Applications, and more.

Why hire PHP web developers from Unleashed Technologies?

  • Hourly rate: $150 — $199 / hr
  • Employees strength: 10 – 49
  • 40+ Awards for Web Development & Design
  • Clients: The United States Army, Sandy Spring Bank

16) Spire Digital

Spire Digital is a leading IT solution company with an expert team of PHP developers. The organization works with businesses to provide high-end mobile, web & cloud application development services. The company’s PHP developers have expertise across various industries.

Services provided by Spire Digital: Custom Software Development, Android & iOS App Solutions and Maintenance, Web Application Design & Implementation Services, Cloud Computing Solution Provider Company.

  • Clutch Taring: 4.8

17) OneEach Technologies

OneEach Technologies is a renowned PHP development company that was established in 2001. The experienced staff of this organization can provide feature-rich products and services per your requirements.

Services provided by OneEach: Custom Software Development, Mobile App Design & Development Services, Quality Assurance, Social Media Marketing, drupal websites, Ecommerce Solutions for Websites & Apps, and so on.

Why Hire PHP Coders from OneEach Technologies?

  • Clients: YMCA, Meals on Wheels, Boys and Girls Clubs, YWCA

18) DesignHammer

Design Hammer is an award-winning web strategy, design, and development agency that has worked for over 14 years. The company’s PHP development team can help you build new websites mobile apps, convert existing projects into WordPress or Joomla sites, etc.

Services provided by DesignHammer: Web Design, Mobile Application Development, Web Development, SEO, Website Development, PHP Development, Consulting, Email Marketing, Drupal, WordPress, Digital Marketing Drupal8, UX/UI Design, and Web Strategy.

Why hire PHP developers DesignHammer?

  • 21+ years of experience

19) Boldare

Boldare is an award-winning software development company founded in 2004. They mainly specialize in building exceptional web apps of all shapes and sizes using the latest technologies such as PHP, Laravel Framework, MySQL & Bootstrap. The team of PHP developers of the corporation is so talented that they have the ability to deliver top-notch projects in a timely manner.

Services offered by Boldare: Web Apps, Mobile Applications, PHP web development, Java, JavaScript, Angular, Product Design, Machine Learning, Interface Design, Digital Transformation, Web Design, Bespoke Software Development, and more.

Why hire PHP Coders from Boldare?

20) Reaktiv

Reaktiv is a full-service mobile and web development company focusing on cloud computing. They provide custom software solutions for startups, SMBs, and enterprises across the globe.

Their team of experienced professionals delivers high-quality products that help their clients achieve success in today’s competitive business world using cutting-edge technologies such as PHP, MySQL, and more.

Services proffered by Reaktiv: API & Integrations, Strategy & Consultancy, WordPress VIP Service Partner, PHP Development, Enterprise-Scale Development, Code Review, WordPress Multisite, E-Commerce, Collaboration, and Bespoke Development.

Why hire PHP Coders from Reaktiv?

  • 10+ years of experience
  • Hourly rate: $150 — $199 / hr
  • Employees strength: 10–49
  • Clients: Wirecutter, Atlassian, Intuit, Cornell University

21) The Software House

The Software House is an award-winning corporation specializing in developing web and mobile solutions. They have offices based out of Gliwice, Śląskie. The organization has over ten years of experience with PHP web app development services.

Services offered by The Software House: PHP development, Web Development, Mobile Development, UX/UI design, Product Design, Software Development, PHP Symfony, Vue.js, Redux, Laravel, AWS, and more.

Why hire PHP developers at The Software House?

  • 10+ years of experience

  • 140+ Happy Clients

  • Clients: Prografix, TVT, Child Care Center Software, MEDarchiver

22) nclud

nclud is a recognized web design and development company focusing on creating beautiful, functional websites. The corporation is headquartered in Washington, DC.

The PHP development team has extensive experience designing interactive user experiences & building products on cutting-edge technologies. They’re well-known for their on-time and budget-friendly product delivery ability.

Services proffered by nclud: Information Architecture, PHP development, Web Design, User Experience, Brand Experience, Mobile & Web development, Front- and back-end development, Web Standards, Digital Strategy, and more.

Why hire PHP coders from nclud?

  • 24+ years of experience
  • Hourly pricing: $150 — $199 / hr
  • Min. project cost:$25,000+
  • Employee strength: 10-49
  • Clients: Bethesda Softworks, Intel, Tesla Motors, Habitat For Humanity

Ending Words

The IT outsourcing companies mentioned above offer reliable PHP web development services. These companies have made a mark in the market to attain global recognition.

A few PHP website development companies are recommended based on our research and stats on platforms such as Clutch, Glassdoors, etc. These include OpenSource Technologies, invertio, and PixelCrayons for reliable and trustworthy solutions.
